## Biography

Jacob a research assistant in the lab. He is in the 3rd year of a degree in
Computer Science, with interests in analyzing
spatial structure of stands with terrestrial laser scanning.

## Education

-   **University of Toronto**<br /> B.Sc in Computer Science (2021 - PRESENT)

## Role In The Lab
Jacob is examining the different efficiencies of various TLS scanning methodologies. Additionally, he is examining
ways to quantify scan efficiency, as well as ways to compute physical fuel attributes from TLS scans.
